product.title: The Skyline Reversible Maxi Bomber in Black
product.body_html: The reversible maxi Skyline bomber has it all: the looks, the brains, and the performance. Simply put: it's an icon. Made from a recycled PET bottle blend and animal-free Thermore® Ecodown® insulation, this wind-resistant and water-repellent jacket is designed to keep you warm and dry throughout the seasons, year after year. Reversible and versatile, one side features a diamond-shaped quilted texture, two welt side pockets with zipper closure, and a patch pocket at the chest. The other side is smooth, with two lower seam pockets on each side. Cire finish for added fabric protection. Above-the-knee- length. Ribbed collar and cuffs. Fully machine washable (to save you a yearly trip to the dry-cleaners). After years of research to optimize layering and help you handle harsh weather conditions, consider this your go-to piece to wear alone or under any coat. Also compatible with all Smart-Layer topcoats thanks to our famous snap system.
